__ATTN__: Do not edit this file; changes belong in the appropriate YAML file.

tests.name: Basic Example
tests.desc: Dot notation should be a form of shorthand for sections.

tests.name: Arbitrary Depth
tests.desc: Dot notation should be functional to any level of nesting.

tests.name: Broken Chain
tests.desc: Any falsey value prior to the last part of the name should yield ''.

tests.name: Broken Chain Resolution
tests.desc: Each part of a dotted name should be resolved only against its elder.

tests.name: Initial Key Resolution
tests.desc: The first part of a dotted name should resolve as any other name.
